title: Ketu Transit in the 7th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Ketu transits the 7th house for Scorpio Ascendant, detachment influences partnerships, marriage, and public interactions. This phase reduces emotional dependence on relationships and weakens the urge to seek validation through others. Partnerships may feel distant, karmic, or purpose-driven rather than romantic. Business alliances require clarity, as confusion or withdrawal can arise. When handled consciously, this transit brings maturity in relationships, freedom from dependency, and the ability to engage in partnerships with balance and inner independence.
closing: This Ketu transit dissolves dependency in partnerships. With awareness, it creates mature bonds rooted in balance, clarity, and inner independence.
